sections.content:
Question:
Is there a PMIC that can be used in combination with the RZ/G3S?
Answer:
We provide a PMIC (RAA215300) with a design optimized for the RZ/G3S. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/power-power-management/power-management-ics-pmic-and-pmus/raa215300-high-performance-9-channel-pmic-supporting-ddr-memory-built-charger-and-rtc 
Please also refer to the example of a winning combination which combines the RAA215300 with the RZ/G3S.
Suitable Products
RZ/G3S
